attributes.action: No individual should be allowed to charged under the law for benefit fraud until all mp`s are charged and cleared or found guilty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can Honorable people create laws that impact so harsh on the lower class. then break them or miss-use or bend them. considering the amounts of money taken.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the police.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
